evidence.claim: ARM utilizes AWS services for cloud storage and computing.
The company complies with HIPAA regulations for health data management.
ARM integrates with EHR systems using HL7 and FHIR standards.
ARM uses cloud-based solutions like Azure for data storage and processing.
They support X12 transaction sets for billing and payment processing.

icp.icp_reason: ARM's health tech includes HIPAA X12 specifications and integration capabilities suggest alignment with API-first healthcare exchange.
